name: Heath® Bar Cookies
author: pchanner
summary: Super-delicious cookies with little chunks of Heath Bar®. Can't eat just one.
ingredients: 1 cup chopped chocolate-covered toffee candy bars (such as Heath®)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Beat butter and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until creamy
Beat egg and vanilla extract into the butter mixture
Sift flour, baking soda, and salt together in a separate bowl; stir into the butter mixture
Fold chopped candy bars into the mixture
Drop batter by the teaspoonful onto prepared baking sheets
Bake in preheated oven until golden brown, 12 to 15 minutes
Cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes before transferring to cooling racks to cool completely
